Articles.Content:
The Dragonfly is a versatile stock craft which flies very similar to a helicopter while still easy to handle without SAS. Except for landings... This is the reason we equipped it with 4 parachutes.

Download here (joystick recommended): https://www.dropbox.com/s/g0bg1vuddopt58f/Dragonfly%20I.craft?dl=0

Hey, that's pretty neato.

What song is that in the vid? I'm really digging it.
The song is El Brujo by Wo Fat. Found it with the youtube search after uploading the video.
